title: Sarah Everard killing and London police handling of demonstrations against violence targeting women sparks growing backlash
content:
1. Sarah Everard killing and London police handling of demonstrations against violence targeting women sparks growing backlash  CBS News
  2. Sarah Everard: Police response to women rallying against male violence roils U.K.  NBC News
  3. Metropolitan Police chief refuses to resign after violent clashes at Sarah Everard vigil  Fox News
  4. 'If it had been lawful, I'd have been there,' says Cressida Dick after Sarah Everard vigil – video  The Guardian
  5. The vigils were not just about Sarah Everard, but about the whole justice system  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 萨拉-埃弗拉德遇害案和伦敦警方对反对暴力侵害妇女的示威游行的处理引发越来越大的反响
薩拉-埃弗拉德遇害案和倫敦警方對反對暴力侵害婦女的示威遊行的處理引發越來越大的反響
